general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing and spraying operations according to the weather forecast. Provision should be made to protect crops and animals from the cold. Sowing of Rabi crops should be completed.

advisory: There is some rainfall expected in the first half of upcoming days so farmers are advised to wait for harvesting operations and store the harvested paddy crop safely.
Use 'Super Grain Bag' for safe storage of paddy/rice.
Farmers should start field preparation for summer season rice cultivation.
Select improved varieties like MTU 1010, MTU 1156, MTU 1001, Lalat, Improved Lalat, Chandan, Swarna, etc.
Treat seeds with carbendazim and imidacloprid before sowing.
Sow seeds with proper spacing and use recommended varieties.
Use improved groundnut varieties for sowing.
Ensure seed treatment and proper spacing for sowing.
Use straw for mulching in vegetable crops.
Monitor for Diamond back moth in cauliflower and use pheromone trap if necessary.
Protect animals from cold weather and provide clean drinking water.
Vaccinate and deworm animals to control diseases.
Ensure proper ventilation in poultry houses.
Provide external heat source and maintain suitable drinking water temperature.
